Then, will Taiwan experience an average annual temperature increase of at least 1.5 degrees Celsius above the 1991-2020 average by January 1, 2028, as reported by the Central Weather Bureau of Taiwan, with temperature data officially published by them at any point between October 1, 2024, and January 1, 2028?

This inquiry examines the connection between two distinct occurrences related to the adoption of artificial intelligence in various nations.

Condition (P): Italy adopts AI for public administration functions prior to January 1, 2028. This will be considered 'Yes' if, between October 1, 2024, and January 1, 2028, the Italian government publicly announces the adoption of an artificial intelligence system for public administration functions. The announcement must come from an official government source or a credible news outlet.

Outcome (Q): Canada establishes a national artificial intelligence policy before January 1, 2028. This will be regarded as 'Yes' if, between October 1, 2024, and January 1, 2028, the Government of Canada officially establishes a national artificial intelligence policy. The policy must be formally declared by the Government of Canada and recorded in official government documents or press releases.

Assuming the condition regarding Italy is satisfied, will the outcome regarding Canada also hold true?
